title: Carousel in Product Detail Page
description: It would be nice to have a carousel in the product detail page to view additional product items!

title: Star Rating
description: I would love to have a five star rating under each product on the products page or in the product detail page or both!

title: Product Tags
description: It would be cool to be able to tag products.

title: Submit Bugs
description: It would be cool if the feature board also supported bugs so I can submit any bugs I see on the website.

title: Shopping Cart
description: I would like to add products to a shopping cart!

title: Purchase a Product
description: I would like to be able to actually buy a product!

title: Wishlist
description: I would like to favorite a product!
